'''Lotus Flower Crisp''' is a [[food]] that the player can cook. The [[recipe]] for Lotus Flower Crisp is obtainable from [[Ms. Yu]] after reaching [[Reputation]] Level 4 in [[Liyue]].

Depending on the quality, Lotus Flower Crisp increases the party's defense by '''165'''/'''200'''/'''235''' for 300 seconds. Like most foods, this has no effect for other players in [[Co-Op Mode]].

==Trivia==
* The Steambird's [[The Steambird#Teyvat Food Notes|Teyvat Food Notes]] column, which are blog posts on the Chinese official site, released a [https://ys.mihoyo.com/main/news/detail/12566 real-life recipe] for Lotus Flower Crisp.
** While Lotus Heads are not used in the in-game recipe, the real-life version contains lotus paste.
